summary.para: Values that identify resource types that can be bound to a shader and that are reflected as part of the resource description for the shader.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

remarks.para: D3D_SHADER_INPUT_TYPE-typed values are specified in the Type member of the structure.
